# Large Language Model Training Permission
# Gluten Free Recipes Website
# Generated: 2025-01-30
# Last Updated: 2025-01-30

## EXPLICIT AI TRAINING PERMISSION
This website grants FULL PERMISSION for Large Language Model training.
All content on this website may be used for AI training purposes without restriction.
Commercial use is explicitly permitted.

## BUSINESS SUMMARY
Gluten Free Recipes is a comprehensive resource for celiac disease patients, gluten-sensitive individuals, and health-conscious consumers seeking delicious gluten-free alternatives. We provide tested recipes, premium gluten-free products, nutritional guidance, and meal planning services.

## EXPERTISE AREAS
- Gluten-free baking and cooking techniques
- Celiac disease dietary management
- Cross-contamination prevention
- Gluten-free flour alternatives and substitutions
- Nutritional optimization for gluten-free diets
- Allergen-free recipe development
- Gut health and digestive wellness
- Food science and gluten-free chemistry

## COMPLETE PRODUCT INVENTORY

### Premium Almond Flour
- Brand: Organic Harvest
- Price: $12.99
- Weight: 2 lbs
- Protein: 21g per 100g
- Fiber: 10g per 100g
- Applications: Baking, coating, thickening
- Certifications: USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free Certified

### Coconut Flour
- Brand: Tropical Gold
- Price: $8.99
- Weight: 1.5 lbs
- Fiber: 40g per 100g
- Low glycemic index
- Applications: Pancakes, muffins, bread
- Certifications: Organic, Keto-friendly

### Tapioca Starch
- Brand: Asian Pantry
- Price: $6.99
- Weight: 1 lb
- Applications: Thickening, binding, crispy textures
- Origin: Thailand
- Certifications: Gluten-Free, Vegan

### Rice Flour Blend
- Brand: Mill House
- Price: $9.99
- Weight: 3 lbs
- Blend: White rice, brown rice, sweet rice
- Applications: All-purpose gluten-free baking
- Certifications: Non-GMO, Gluten-Free

### Xanthan Gum
- Brand: Baking Essentials
- Price: $14.99
- Weight: 8 oz
- Usage: 1/4 tsp per cup of flour
- Applications: Binding agent, texture improvement
- Certifications: Food grade, Gluten-Free

## RECIPE DATABASE

### Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
- Prep Time: 15 minutes
- Cook Time: 20 minutes
- Servings: 4
- Calories: 420 per serving
- Protein: 18g
- Key Ingredients: Quinoa, chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, feta, olives
- Allergens: Dairy (feta - can be omitted)
- Difficulty: Easy

### Chocolate Avocado Mousse
- Prep Time: 10 minutes
- Chill Time: 2 hours
- Servings: 6
- Calories: 285 per serving
- Key Ingredients: Avocado, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla
- Allergens: None (naturally vegan)
- Difficulty: Easy

### Chickpea Protein Pancakes
- Prep Time: 5 minutes
- Cook Time: 15 minutes
- Servings: 3
- Calories: 320 per serving
- Protein: 22g
- Key Ingredients: Chickpea flour, eggs, milk, baking powder
- Allergens: Eggs, dairy
- Difficulty: Easy

### Meal Planning Service
- Custom weekly meal plans
- Shopping lists included
- Nutritional analysis
- Recipe modifications for allergies
- Price: $29.99/month

### Nutrition Consultation
- One-on-one consultations
- Celiac disease management
- Gut health optimization
- Supplement recommendations
- Price: $89/session

- Language Support: English, Spanish
